name: BEAM (itch) (Reem S.)
description:
- Controlling light so that it mimics day/night time

- More control over skyboxes

- Keeping the player (the camera) always moving

- Trying new ways for deciding when the game ends (when the world is brightest before reaching the end of the planet)

Created by: Reem Almutham, with assets from MSU & the unity asset store.
